scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.build:client: npm run clean && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.run: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:prepare
